casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tilmon Charles GOLPHIN 441A98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 21, 2018 Jay H. Ferguson, Attorney at Law, Kenneth J. Rose, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Golphin, Tilmon Charles. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C. James E. Williams, Jr., Attorney at Law, Carrboro, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of March 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of March 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 3rd day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
